name: Solar System (itch) (rubyaiyoung)
description:
This is my Solar System project. It includes all of the planets, each with their own texture. They rotate around themselves and around the sun. There is also a comet spawner. I added the following elements:

  1. Mercury
  2. Venus
  3. Mars
  4. Jupiter
  5. Saturn
  6. Uranus
  7. Neptune

Created by Ruby Ai Young.
